original_title: Seven-Year-Old Succumbs to Venom After Bite on Errand
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News1st); A 7-year-old boy from Medipokuna in the Uva-Parangama area tragically died after being bitten by a snake on Tuesday.
According to a News 1st correspondent, the incident occurred while the child was delivering a food parcel to a neighbor following an alms giving ceremony at his residence.
Despite being rushed to the Welimada Base Hospital, the boy succumbed to complications from the snakebite.
Identified as a student of the Maha Kumburu Vidyalaya in Badulla, the young boy's sudden death has cast a shadow over the local community.
